name: A Piece of Joy
description:
Follow a young woman as she travels a maze-like forest to a place where she and her child can live peacefully. Help her find food and clothing to survive through a cold winter night. 

Note: If the bar depletes rapidly while walking to the left or right, that's just a bug. It will go back to the regular value if you let those keys go. I don't know why it's happening or how to fix it. 

Everything made by me

Made for Mini Jam 69
